title: GAP: Decision Episode sealing (post-run binds outcome to intent+authority+inputs)
GAP: Replay/Nonce Protection Enforcement (prevent repeat execution without idempotency key)
GAP: Authority Signature Verification (remove placeholder signing)
GAP: Pre-Execution Gate (block execution unless Intent + Authority + Policy satisfied)
GAP: Audit-Neutral Output Pack (context-free review bundle)
GAP: Claim->Evidence->Authority binding model (machine-checkable)
GAP: Decision Invariants Ledger (PRIME-like invariants for decisions)
GAP: Intent Mutation Detection (diff + alert if intent changes after approval)
GAP: Intent Hash Binding (intent hash must match action contract before execution)
GAP: Intent Packet schema (intent -> scope -> risk -> success criteria)
GAP: Replay Runner (one-command) to reproduce last run from sealed artifacts
GAP: Deterministic Environment Fingerprint (runtime + dependencies)
GAP: Sealed Input State Snapshot (pre-run) + provenance bundle
GAP: Deterministic Replay Spec (What must be sealed to replay?)
EPIC: Close the 4 Gaps (Determinism + Intent + Audit-Neutral Logic + Pre-Exec Accountability)
v2.1.0-pre: Jira Import/Export Adapter
v2.1.0-pre: SharePoint / Teams Export Mode
v2.1.0-pre: GitHub Issues → DLR Mapping
v2.0.8: pilot_pack Folder
v2.0.8: Decision Office Templates
v2.0.8: make try (10-Minute Pilot Mode)
